# Awesome Electron [![Awesome](https://awesome.re/badge.svg)](https://awesome.re)

- [Who is hiring?](https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome-electron/issues/612)

### Closed Source

- [GitKraken](http://www.gitkraken.com) - Git client.
